bibl.title: The Grammatical Papyrus P. Berol. inv. 9917.
bibl.note: Part of an extensive papyrus codex containing a t°xnh grammatikÆ, ca. A.D. 300. Bought by Dr. Rubensohn in 1903. A complete edition of the papyrus, with elaborate commentary, will appear in the near future, in ArchPF. <techne grammatike>
WOUTERS Alfons, The Grammatical Papyrus P. Berol. inv. 9917.
Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. II (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 1021-1033.
